=Example of Paypal on Cubi Payment Intergration=

Nowadays there are lots of time we need payment function for our website or online business applications.

And more and more clients ask developer to build the payment function for their online business applications.

So the good news is we have made a new payment module into the latest Cubi Platform now.

Here is a simple example that how to setting an payment account in Cubi.

==step1: Let's open payment intergration window and click edit button==
http://openbiz-cubi.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/docs/img/payment_paypal_example/payment_paypal_pic1.png

==step2: Here we input the account ==
*that will be used for receiving money and enable it*

http://openbiz-cubi.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/docs/img/payment_paypal_example/payment_paypal_pic2.png

==step3: Here we can see all the setting done==
*and callback URL*

http://openbiz-cubi.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/docs/img/payment_paypal_example/payment_paypal_pic3.png

==step4: Open the Google+ API==
http://openbiz-cubi.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/docs/img/payment_paypal_example/payment_paypal_pic4.png

==step5: Click "Create an OAuth 2.0 client ID"==
http://openbiz-cubi.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/docs/img/payment_paypal_example/payment_paypal_pic5.png

==step6: Input the information of the OAuth ID==
*The "Home Page URL:" is the application or website you will use the OAuth on URL, here i used my localhost for the example*

http://openbiz-cubi.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/docs/img/payment_paypal_example/payment_paypal_pic6.png
